exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type Q : code i, j : nat a, l, r : list X H : j = i + length l H0 : (i, l ++ a ++ r) <sc Q H1 : (i, l ++ a ++ r) <sc (j, a) -> fst (j, a) <= fst (i, l ++ a ++ r) Unable to unify "fst (j, a) <= fst (i, l ++ a ++ r)" with "(j, a) <sc Q".
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.
Found no subterm matching "fst ?c + length (snd ?c)" in the current goal.

original: intros. intros H1 H2. apply (subcode_length_le (i, l ++ a ++ r) (j, a)). split. - rewrite H1. reflexivity. - rewrite app_length. repeat rewrite app_length. rewrite H2. reflexivity.
